casestudies.title: Launching India’s first clothes management system
casestudies.descrtiption1: Mainetti, the world’s largest hanger makers from Italy desired to enter the high volume & highly  commoditized Indian  consumer hanger market
casestudies.descrtiption2: They reached out to  The Suits to create a compelling brand story and a unique visual identity

casestudies.title: Music you can wear
casestudies.descrtiption1: Our research pointed at the need to create the habit of using hangers to dry and store clothes among Indians
casestudies.descrtiption2: We positioned the brand as a clothes management solution
casestudies.client: A brand that will educate consumers on maintaining clothes and develop unique wardrobe ideas

casestudies.title: A real esate magazine with no real estate advertisements
casestudies.descrtiption1: The brand name brought out the intimate relationship between clothes and hangers,with an Italian touch
casestudies.descrtiption2: Belocopia from the Italianwords, Bella-beautiful & coppia-couple
casestudies.client: The brand thought: “Well dressed You” was crafted from the insight neatly organised clothes inspire you to dress well everyday

casestudies.title: Giving a leading Fintech giant a digital headstart
casestudies.descrtiption1: Graphic, playful and stylish: three words that will describe the visual language of the brand

casestudies.title: Aspirational product & packaging design
casestudies.descrtiption1: For the first time the Indian market saw hangers that were artsy with multi-coloured hang-ers in a single pack and pack-aging that was smart
casestudies.descrtiption2: Every collection was thought through with appropriate names
